input.sentences: when we arrived at the scene we were surprised to find broken glass on the ground .
a cigarette lay in the shards and we wondered if it would provide a clue for the police .
the sudden change in plans caused by the break-in made for a long walk home in the cold .
the beauty and solitude of the quiet pond was a comforting contrast to the chaos in the city .
as the sun rose | we knew that more damage would likely be found . the quiet streets were like the calm after the storm .
output.sentences: ONE MAN IS WALKING ON THE ROAD
